name: 1deval
author: AFNI Developers
description: Evaluates an expression that may include columns of data from one or more text files and writes the result to stdout.

inputs.description: Use 'd' as the step for a single undetermined variable in the expression.
inputs.name: Step for undetermined variable

inputs.description: Start at value 's' for a single undetermined variable in the expression.
inputs.name: Start value

inputs.description: Read index column from file i.1D and write it out as 1st column of output.
inputs.name: Index column file

inputs.description: Write output in the form of a single '1D:' string suitable for input on the command line of another program.
inputs.name: 1D formatted output

inputs.description: Read time series file and assign it to the symbol 'a'. Letters 'a' to 'z' may be used as symbols.
inputs.name: Symbols assignment

inputs.description: Assign a fixed numerical value to the symbol 'a'. Letters 'a' to 'z' may be used as symbols.
inputs.name: Symbols fixed values
